text: Hip hop soul is a subgenre of hip hop, contemporary R&B;, soul, and new jack swing. ==Characteristics== Hip hop soul first started as a genre that fused hip hop with soul music. Some of the best songs of hip hop soul include "I'll Make Love to You", "Lonely", "Swim Good", "Ya Lil (Al Anisa Farah)" and "Can't Be Without You". It was very popular at first. Then, it began to lose commercial success because of its late sexual lyrics and dark themes. ==Notable hip hop soul artists== Category:Fusion music genres Category:Hip hop genres Category:Soul music Category:R&B; music
title: Hip hop soul
